We added a smart auto-enhancement button in Polarr! Try out the Auto-enhance button and see how Polarr make light adjustments for you. You can see what parameters are adjusted and apply Auto-enhancement on top of your existing edits or filters. This is just a beginning, more smart features coming soon!

Polarr now includes new powerful face-editing tools. With automatic multiple face detection, you can smooth skin, whiten teeth, adjust skin tone, reshape the face, and more! Polarr auto-detects multiple facial features, so it applies the adjustments to just the right places, automatically. All new face tools are currently available for free. 

The new version also includes a powerful new denoise tool built on a machine-learning model to offer unparalleled clarity and focus.
 
The face-editing adjustment suite includes:

• A powerful auto-enhance face-editing button
• Skin smoothing, texture, hue and tone adjustments
• Teeth whitening and brightening adjustments
• Eye-brightening adjustments
• Lip brightness and saturation adjustments
• Face reshaping and contouring tools

Not to mention Polarr's redesigned selection of powerful tools:

• New Denoise tool for greater enhancement and clarity
• One-click automatic global enhancement for saturation, highlight, shadows, contrast and exposure levels
• New navigation bar system and workspace with drag-to-rearrange tools.
• New Curves, HSL, Toning, Distortion tools
• New lens blur tool for radial and gradient masks
• Color masking tools
• New advanced brush tools
• Step-by-step interactive photo editing tutorials.

This version has a more advanced face-editing tool suite. New features of the face-editing panel include:

• The ability to manually select a face where none is automatically detected
• Different strength levels for the face reshaping and contouring tool
• "Smart skin intelligence" for skin smoothing and toning beyond just the face: neck, hands, arms, and more.

Introducing text tools. Our new text tools let you add text and shapes to photos. With features like letter and line spacing, alignment, and wrapping, you have full control your text. We've even included advanced features like dynamic vector scaling and a unique blending adjustment.

We also fixed purchase related issues and scrolling issues for iOS 9 users.

We have a great new update for you. It's all about adding powerful new face editing options and new tools for you. 

- Revamped Face tool! All the face editing tools from before, but with even more. Now you can detect multiple faces, edit facial expressions, adjust dimensions of the face, chin, or forehead, and you can even adjust skin highlights or shadows. 
- New Spot removal panel! We've added a Heal tool and Clone tool so you can have even more power when editing your photos. 
- New Liquify panel! A Warp tool, Pinch tool, and Bulge tool have been added. These allow you to distort sections of your image. 
- Improved Color mask! The Color mask works better now with an added color picker to select a specific color or color range for manipulation 
- Filters makeover. Design changes make it easier to browse our filters. But we went a step further and improved each filter. 
- New app icons and tool designs throughout the app. 
- Redesigned Curve tool. The UI for the Curve tool now fills the screen to make it easier to manipulate. 
- Polarr Pro trial. The store in the app now includes a Polarr Pro trial so you can try out all of our advanced tools 
- Watermark improvement. When you enable watermarks they'll now persist on screen for all photos you edit. 
- Bug fixes and performance improvements. As always, this release contains numerous improvements to the app and bug fixes. 

We hope you enjoy this huge update! You can email us at support@polarr.co for any feedback or bugs you find. Don't forget to follow us on Twitter (@polarrist) or Facebook (@polarrian) for more.

4.1.0 includes iOS 11 support and the largest UI update in Polarr since 2015. We introduce a new UI mode called "Express Mode". Express Mode allows you to only add the tools you want to use to the toolbar, and provides you a simpler and more customizable photo editing experience. 

1) New Express UI Mode. You can switch to Express Mode in Settings.
2) Newly designed filter panel to allow fast preview and selection.
3) iPad iOS 11 workspace integration - drag files directly from other window into Polarr.
4) Plenty of small UI improvements and performance updates.

A special shoutout to Joseph from photoapps.expert for recommending we add a recording mode into Polarr. All content creators and educators will benefit from it! 

In this 4.2.0 update, we have the following additions and changes:

1. Adding support for iOS 11's HEIF file export.
2. PNG file export.
3. A special recording mode in settings to help users see touches while recording tutorials.
4. Five more interactive tutorials.
5. You can log in now in Polarr extension.
6. Bug fixes (Find a bug? Email us support@polarr.co so we can exterminate it!)
7. Social media presets and estimated image size now available when exporting.
8. Watermark now supported with batch export. 

In case you missed 4.1.0 update last week:

4.1.0 includes iOS 11 support and the largest UI update in Polarr since 2015. We introduce a new UI mode called "Express Mode". Express Mode allows you to only add the tools you want to use to the toolbar and provides you a simpler and more customizable photo editing experience. 

1. New Express UI Mode. You can switch to Express Mode in Settings.
2. Newly designed filter panel to allow fast preview and selection.
3. iPad iOS 11 workspace integration - drag files directly from another window into Polarr.
4. Plenty of small UI improvements and performance updates.

A special shoutout to Joseph from photoapps.expert for recommending we add a recording mode into Polarr. All content creators and educators will benefit from it! 

In this 4.2.0 update, we have the following additions and changes:

1. Adding support for iOS 11's HEIF file export.
2. PNG file export.
3. A special recording mode in settings to help users see touches while recording tutorials.
4. Five more interactive tutorials.
5. You can log in now in Polarr extension.
6. Bug fixes (Find a bug? Email us support@polarr.co so we can exterminate it!)
7. Social media presets and estimated image size now available when exporting.
8. Watermark now supported with batch export.

Version 5.0 is the start of a new era for Polarr. And this update lays the foundation for huge things to come. 

There. Are. So. Many. New. Things. In. This. Update. 

But we'll highlight the big ones. 

Overlays

Polarr now has overlay support! That means you can superimpose two images together or add things to your images. We've added a bunch of different effects to get you started. Look forward to adding things like light leaks, flares, clouds, weather effects, backgrounds, gradients, and more to your photos. Beyond the effects we included, you can choose your own photos! Up 12 different images can be stacked together. Our overlays work with all of the local adjustment masks too. 

Support for editing portrait mode photos

Have a phone that captures depth data from dual lenses? Then you've probably used it to take some portrait photos. Our new update allows you to edit those photos and create local adjustment masks using that depth data! 

Duotone your images 

Building overlays allowed us to introduce duotone editing to the app. You have a bunch of presets to chose from or you can build a duotone image from scratch.  

Subscription

Polarr Pro is how you unlock all the powerful and advanced features in the app. Pay for your subscription month-to-month or yearly! Either way, you'll be able to use your pro features on ALL of your devices. Enjoy! 

Misc. 

We had to drop iOS 9 support, but that helped us make using the brush faster. 

Added account management to settings!

In this version of Polarr, we're introducing some new exciting features:
- 8 point perspective distortion tool with auto clipping, now pro members can use this new tool to create free distortion in their image.
- Edge-aware brush for pro members, now brushing automatically turns on edge aware to help you make more precise brush adjustment.
- Mesh preview for liquify tools, you can now preview the distortion mesh of the liquify tool.
- Window snapshot for brush and liquify tools, you can now see where your finger is at with a small activity window.
- Revamped filter creation dialog, it is now much easier to preview and configure your filters than previously.
- New color themes and more flexibility to control color themes
- Make face edits part of custom filters
- Lots of bug fixes

Version 5.1.1 fixes the following issues:
- Based on feedback we received, we restored the old custom filters' effects. You can now choose what rendering pipeline to use for custom filters, by default it will automatically detect and choose the correct rendering pipeline version to match the look. We also fixed an issue where some user can't select custom filters. Thank you to @tatiapetrova and @itmoviescenes for helping us troubleshoot! 
- Fixed app launch issues for iOS 10 users.

- New color themes and more flexibility to control color themes
- Make face edits part of custom filters
- Lots of bug fixes

Version 5.1.1 fixes the following issues:
- Based on feedback we received, we restored the old custom filters' effects. You can now choose what rendering pipeline to use for custom filters, by default it will automatically detect and choose the correct rendering pipeline version to match the look. We also fixed an issue where some user can't select custom filters. Thank you to @tatiapetrova and @itmoviescenes for helping us troubleshoot! 
- Fixed app launch issues for iOS 10 users.

Don't forget to read what's new in version 5.1.0:
- 8 point perspective distortion tool with auto clipping, now pro members can use this new tool to create free distortion in their image.
- Edge-aware brush for pro members, now brushing automatically turns on edge aware to help you make more precise brush adjustment.
- Mesh preview for liquify tools, you can now preview the distortion mesh of the liquify tool.
- Window snapshot for brush and liquify tools, you can now see where your finger is at with a small activity window.
- Revamped filter creation dialog, it is now much easier to preview and configure your filters than previously.
- New color themes and more flexibility to control color themes
- Make face edits part of custom filters
- Lots of bug fixes

This is our biggest release since early May when we introduced overlays, a new depth mask, gradients and duotones. 

Here's what's new in 5.2.0:

• New text tools. You can now import custom fonts, add shadows, borders, change perspectives, erase and blend with color, radial, gradient, depth and brush masks.
• New border tools. We added a border tool that automatically suggests border colors based on the color of your photo. You can also adjust border size and aspect ratio.
• New fringing tool. You can now add more type of blurs, colors, as well as controlling the radius and center point of the fringing tool.
• Other stability enhancements.

Hello! We've added a new Reflect tool to the effects panel. This tool allows you to create exciting and abstract art by mirror parts of your image. The pixelate tool has also been updated to let you select the shape of your pixels. Select from fun shapes like dots, triangles and more!

• New: Reflect effect
• Updated: Pixelate effect
• New: Ability to 'flatten' an image
• New: 1 free export per day for free users
• Misc: Bug fixes and performance improvements

Free? Yes. You can use all of the pro tools inside Polarr if you're not a pro user. You're limited to one export per day.

Email us, support@polarr.co, if you find any bugs or need help with anything. Thanks for all the support!

Hello, friends! This update blends new features with performance updates and bug fixes. The most significant change is with the gallery - it’s all-new! All images can now be viewed in their respective aspect ratio before you open the photo. Tap the expand icon in the lower-right to enlarge an image before opening the editing panel. We also have two new tabs: edited and exported. All of your pictures that you’re working on with edits will show up under the edited tab. Those that you’ve saved will be under the exported tab. Ahem. Polarr for iOS now supports loading RAW photos!

• New: A redesigned gallery. You need to see it to believe it.
• New: Supports loading RAW photos!
• Enhanced: Settings menu has been revamped to provide debug info when you email support with bug issues.
• Enhanced: Significantly faster startup launch time
• Enhanced: Smoother scrolling experience
• Misc: Various bug fixes

Email us, support@polarr.co, if you find any bugs, have feedback, or need help with anything!

After many years of experimentations, our team brought Polarr back to its root when the app was first released - making creating and sharing your own aesthetics easy and fun. With a brand new UI design, Polarr 6.0 makes everything you previously enjoy doing easier, faster and more intuitive. 

To help our team focus on building features dedicated to style creation, we decided to remove the text, shape, spot removal and several other features in the app. Some of them will make a comeback in future releases. Despite we believe these are correct decisions for our app to grow further, our team apologizes to some of you for losing some of your favorite features in the release.

- You can now set your social handles and links in your account accessible by your followers and users of your style.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.

- To declutter and make Polarr Style easier to organize. Polarr Styles library has moved to "Discover" where you can find all previous styles.
- Added ability to use Polarr Style on videos by long-tapping a Style (installation of Polarr 24FPS is required)
- Creators can now set more social links in Settings > Account

We made creating smart filters a lot more powerful, and previewing styles a lot easier in this release.

- Added a toggle to preview before and after of all styles in discovery on your current photo
- Much improved smart object segmentation models with more accurate masks and smoother edges for people, sky, background, etc.

- Added more sections and categories to Style Discovery
- Improved experience for previewing styles in side Discovery Feed.

- Simplified log in and sign up experience.
